dt: {bc}awkward and uncultivated in appearance, manner, or behavior {bc}{sx|rude||}
{bc}strange or clumsy in shape or appearance {bc}{sx|outlandish||}
{bc}not known or not familiar to one {bc}seldom experienced {bc}{sx|uncommon||}, {sx|rare||}

et: Middle English, from Old English {it}uncūth{/it}, from {it}un-{/it} + {it}cūth{/it} familiar, known; akin to Old High German {it}kund{/it} known, Old English {it}can{/it} know {ma}{mat|can:1|}{/ma}
shortdef: awkward and uncultivated in appearance, manner, or behavior : rude
lacking in polish and grace : rugged
strange or clumsy in shape or appearance : outlandish
